hooks.command: FILE=$(jq -r '.tool_input.file_path // empty'); if echo "$FILE" | grep -qE '(\.env$|\.env\.)'; then echo 'Blocked: .env files cannot be edited by Claude' >&2; exit 2; fi

hooks.prompt: Check if any code files (.go, .html, .css, .js, .sql, .py, Dockerfile, docker-compose*.yml, Makefile) were modified during this session. If they were, verify that a beads issue was claimed (bd update <id> --status=in_progress) before the modifications. If code was modified without claiming an issue, remind the agent to create and claim a beads issue before completing. Non-code files (.md, .json config) are exempt.
